评论详情: This is so cute and functional. I got it for my 8 year old daughter because she wanted to have one like me. She loved the style and that it has her initial on it. It’s very quality- it has multiple pockets in including one on the back with a zipper. It’s the perfect size to carry everything she needs and not overwhelm her. The material is durable and also easy to wipe off spills or stains. It holds up well in the washing machine as well. Totally recommend this!
